title: Consultant

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to Consult, and you may send them a fake system message.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have 2 uses of Consult.
- Regenerate a use of Consult on each night you don't Consult.
- On full moons, You may choose to make Consulting blackmail players as well.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all opposition to the Elites.

desc:
Post 4897
*Well, I see things a different way.*
